import React, { useEffect ,Fragment} from "react"; import {connect,useSelector} from "react-redux" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Cart=()=>{ const token=useSelector(state=>state.auth.token) const browserHistory=useHistory(); useEffect(()=>{ if(!token){ browserHistory.push("/login") } },[token,browserHistory]) return (
